name: Crystalline (itch) (Do3naut, lilyzhou, Kaiway Tang, fudgeawsome, RSlashSP)
name_original: Crystalline (itch) (Do3naut, lilyzhou, Kaiway Tang, fudgeawsome, RSlashSP)
description:
Explore and fight your way through the Crystal Cove to harness the power of the mana crystals!

Controls:

WASD to move

Rapidly click left click (or J) to perform a 3 hit combo; hold the button to perform a charge attack after the visual indicator - damage increases with longer charge.

Shift to sprint

L-Ctrl to toggle camera lock onto the closest enemy

The green bar represents your health. The yellow bar will charge up as you land more attacks without getting hit. Once it is charged, right click to perform an execute move and acquire the power of the enemy's crystal! Fight through enemies and grow from their power!
